attributes.action: Retain the right for the owner to decide who may enter privately owned property and under what terms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent and proposed legislation has meant that individuals and groups owning property are no longer able to choose who is allowed on their property and what those people do once on that property. For example, hotel owners are not permitted to restrict the sharing of beds by same sex couples, members of clubs are likely to be forced to accept membership applications from people or groups of people they do not wish to become members.

Whilst the undersigned do not believe in discrimination and do not condone harassment of individuals for any reason we believe that the right of the individual to choose who they spend their time with in privately owned premises or premises defined as members only be a matter for choice for the owners of such property.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
